timeline.content:
Hey Aurelia, 

Thanks for contacting amber for your accommodation search in London! I am Prachi and I'll be helping you book your ideal student home. 

Happy to assist you with the process ahead. Thankyou : )

Hello Aurelia Csernak, Good Afternoon!
Hope you're doing well. I'm Prachi from AmberStudent. we’re officially partnered with University College London for accommodation.

We received your booking form for Flora Building, London (Standard Twin, 44 weeks at £289/week). However, your guarantor details were incomplete, so I wasn’t able to start the booking process.

Could you please help by sharing the following guarantor details:

Full Name

Contact Number

Email Address

Date of Birth

Relation to You

Gender

Full Address

We need to provide these details to the property to move forward with your booking. Let me know if you have any questions!

timeline.content:
Hi Aurelia,

We would love an update from you regarding the status of your accommodation. We currently have limited availability and want to help you find accommodation that is well within your 
requirements.

Just in case, if you have already found accommodation, you can help us with the details and we can try rolling out cashbacks for you, subject to availability in London.

Also, if you have friends looking for student accommodation, you can refer them at http://amberstudent.com/refer. If your referred friend books accommodation, you will get a 50 GBP Amazon gift card.

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone please record your message. When you have finished recording you may hang up.
Speaker B: Hello? Yeah hi, good morning, I am Prachi from Amber Student Accommodation Assistant. We are the partner with the University College London about the accommodation part and we received a booking form for the property that was the Flora Building, London. So that's why I connected with you to get the update regarding the accommodation part. I have also shared my WhatsApp with you so please do let me know like if you want to start the processing for this accommodation because we required the emergency and contact details properly as I can see the guarantee details and the emergency details are bit incomplete so please do connect with me or if you require any other options so you can let me know on the WhatsApp I can share that with you. Thank you so much. Have a nice day. Bye bye.
